entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Grand Falls-Windsor
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:15 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Badger 2:30 PM NST Friday 03 February 2023
Temperature: -0.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -1.1°C
Wind: SE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 40 gusting to 60 early this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Flurries beginning overnight. Risk of snow squalls overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls early in the morning. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 80 near noon. High minus 13. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow. Windy. Low minus 13. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023
